alert.note: Alert for South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 30 at 2:35AM MST until December 31 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM MST THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...South Laramie Range Foothills including Interstate 80 west of Cheyenne and Interstate 25 between Cheyenne and Chugwater. * WHEN...From 8 AM MST this morning through Saturday evening. The highest chance for strong winds is this evening through Saturday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means a hazardous high wind event is possible. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.
